Hi Sarah,

I hope you are doing well.

We have updated the site and confirming the below has been migrated:

  • CHROME
  • BRUSHED NICKEL
  • MATTE BLACK (delete Matt Black)
  • Brass (delete Matt Brass)
  • Copper (delete Matt Copper)

action.text: Cindy Valderama assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Sarah.

We’ve completed the updates for Matte Brass, Matte Copper, and Matte Graphite.

At this stage, we need to update the products manually to ensure they’re correctly assigned to the appropriate attributes before we proceed with removing the duplicates.

We’ll keep you updated and let you know once all duplicates have been successfully removed.

Thanks so much for the update

Sarah

full_threads.body: @glen, @joel will take over FYI. Thank you

Hi Sarah,

Just a quick update—we're still in the process of merging the products with duplicated attributes.

We're currently exploring a workaround to move the products into their correct classifications without having to do it manually. If needed, our last resort will be to implement a backend solution.

We'll keep you posted and provide an update once the process is complete.

Thank you for your continued patience.

This ticket has been idle for over 24 hours.

If you need to respond to the client, please create a new conversation and close this ticket. Once the new ticket is created, continue the conversation there.

For guidance, refer to this walkthrough: 
  • https://www.loom.com/share/238808eaaeaa428a80a85441547b7e50?sid=1e84bd29-3621-4f82-8dac-5237bd08e5a5
